channel.title: Vengeance
channel.description:
Hi i got a major question How i make like when a player doesn veng It says like taste the vengeance of revolution {my server} BUt i want it like When a PLayeres name is like i kasoy i it comes up like Taste The Power Of I kasoy I
Or when a players name is Kids Ranqe It comes up like Taste The Power Of Kids Ranqe
So help me please :D

item.title: Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:5, topic:195657”]it would be "Taste the Vengance of " +playerName
not +playerName+ if you have a + on both sides it means theres going to be more text after it, if theres 1 before the int then it means the text ahs finished and if theres 1 after the int it means its at the start and there will be more text.[/quote]

Oops, my bad, I didn’t realise I added the extra + lol

Read full topic

item.title: Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:9, topic:195657”][quote author=bhpkyeah link=topic=260155.msg2157788#msg2157788 date=1207261155]

true the correct way to add this would be

"Taste the Vengance of " +playerName;

i just said that you tard, L2R

you said it i showed it tard thats why i put true the correct way… -.-
[/quote]
Read my sig, you basically just gave everything to him on a plate thats how people dont learn anything because nobody ever teaches anyone anything, so thats why i only explained it not showed it.[/quote]

right kinda how u wanted the ip ban method given to ya on a plate… this is simple, dont have to be stuck up all the time. You were new at this shit once before…

Read full topic

item.title: Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

Find “Taste the Vengeance of Revolution” in client.java and change it to:

"Taste the Vengeance of" +playerName+

Read full topic
